package main

import "fmt"

//ListNode å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªé“¾è¡¨ç»“æ„
type ListNode struct {
Â Â Â Â Val int
Â Â Â Â Next *ListNode
}

func main() {

Â Â Â Â Linked()

}

//Linked é“¾è¡¨èŠ‚ç‚¹æ·»åŠ 
func Linked() *ListNode {

Â Â Â Â temp := new(ListNode)
Â Â Â Â fmt.Printf("temp address is %x\n", &temp)

	//ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆæ˜¯å€¼ä¼ é€’ï¼ŒNextçš„åœ°å€å´æ˜¯åŒä¸€ä¸ªåœ°å€ï¼Ÿ
Â Â Â Â current := temp
Â Â Â Â fmt.Printf("current address is %x\n", &current)

Â Â Â Â current.Next = &ListNode{Val: 10, Next: nil}

Â Â Â Â fmt.Printf("current.Next address is %x and Val is %d\n", &current.Next, current.Next.Val)

Â Â Â Â fmt.Printf("temp.Next address is %x and Val is %d\n", &temp.Next, temp.Next.Val)

Â Â Â Â temp.Next = new(ListNode)

Â Â Â Â fmt.Printf("current.Next address is %x and Val is %d\n", &current.Next, current.Next.Val)

Â Â Â Â fmt.Printf("temp.Next address is %x and Val is %d\n", &temp.Next, temp.Next.Val)

Â Â Â Â return temp.Next
}
